summary: Removes some of the more annoying lines from certain NPCs
descriptionHtml:
[b][[url=https://jmrooker.wordpress.com/2016/06/19/a-message-to-my-mod-users-console-gamers-and-mod-makers/]Important Message To My Mod Users, Console Gamers and Mod Makers[/url]] [/b]

Some of the NPCs in Skyrim are just downright obnoxious. Others are nice enough, but I get sick of hearing the same lines from them over and over and over. Whiterun, in particular, seems to be full of annoying NPCs. I'd often end up opening the console and just deleting them whenever I started a new game.

Rather than doing that every time, I decided to track down the specific lines of dialogue from these particular NPCs and simply deleted them. So far, the following lines have been removed (Note: These are just the lines the NPC speaks automatically when you are near them. Other dialogue hasn't been touched):

Whiterun:
Every line by Njada Stonearm
Every line by Tilma
Every line by Sigurd
Skjor: "You still need to prove yourself, whelp."
Braith: "What are you looking at?"
Olfina Graymane: "What's the matter? Can't stand the sight..."
Lilith Maidenloom: "Come to chat with an old woman?" "My friend Maven and I..."
Birgritte Battleborn: "There's a rift here in Skyrim..."
Nelkir: "Another wanderer, here to lick my father's boots..." "The only adults who talk to me..."
Gerda: "I might just be a servant among lords..."
Fianna: "Ain't nobody high and mighty in these halls..."
Nazeem: "Do you get to the cloud district very often?"
Severio Pelagio: "There's a chill in the air."
1.01
Eorlund Graymane: "I ain't much for talking." "Why you still staring at me?"
Adrianne Avenicci: All lines, except "Got some good pieces out here..."

Riften:
Hemming Black-Briar: "Fancy yourself the adventuring type, eh?"
Keerava: "...otherwise, hit the road."
Indaryn: "Yeah? What did you want?"
Grelka: "You going to buy something..." "Can't you bother me at my stand..." "You gonna stare all day..."

Markarth:
Ondolemar: "The Dominion is here and we're watching you." "The Thalmor know how to deal with Talos worshippers."

Winterhold:
Ranmir: "Unless you're bringing me another round..."

Things I'm not touching. Don't ask:
Heimskar's Talos spiel
"...then I took an arrow in the knee."

I'll probably be adding far more. Suggestions are welcome, but I may not add them.

This is a personal mod that I made for my own use and decided to share. If you don't like what it does, stay out of the comments.
author: Rooker
